Game is fun and all, but with a dev team that bans you for asking for help with this cheater epidemic, not really worth the time or money. Do as the head developer said, go play Civ 6. Atleast their dev team wont ban you fro pointing out bugs and stuff in their game
all of the male killers are sexy

A really enjoyable game if you like a bit of horror. A simple concept but works well. I'd recommend buying it. Team work pays off if your a survivor. I'm yet to really get into the killer but i reckon thats fun too.

Great concept of a game, been playing since 2016, but the player base is super toxic, especially twitch streamers who get paid by the developers to play the game, promote new chapters and get any players they dont like banned for life. For example check out MorfUK on Twitch.tv and that is a perfect example of the toxic trash that plagues this game. 

Developers DO NOT CARE about issues with the game, reporting of bad/bullying players, getting back to you when you have an issue. They only care about your money and that you waste it month by month on broken unfinished laggy DLC chapters. The time in between new chapters is decreasing year by year which shows they only care about getting more money as quickly as possible. When one chapter fails, they leave it and start on a new chapter as this will get them more money than fixing the previous chapter and they hope the new chapter will make you forget about the pathetic previous one. The player-base numbers are dwindling month by month and the average time a new player spends on the game is diminishing; both of these things tells you everything. Failing game due to DISGUSTING Developers and a toxic community riddled with high ego twitch players who think they are pros and have the say on gameplay. 

I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS GAME. DO NOT GIVE THESE GREEDY PATHETIC LOSERS YOUR HARD-EARNED MONEY ON A BROKEN GAME.

This game is simply AMAZING and one of its kind!! I love the details especially on the survivors and killers, the artistic team rocks! What I love the most about this game is that it is challenging, and takes skill development to get good at whether you are survivor or killer. Get ready to experience an incredible experience, but also to experience frustration like no other, not an easy game!
